response.original_title: Don't They Serve Candy In Hell?
response.overview: If Willy Wonka Was a horror movie....After a newly appointed CEO shuts down the candy division run by an eccentric and possibly insane candy inventor, he and his family feel the wrath of the crazed candy crafter, whos now out for as much blood as he is sweets.
response.title: Don't They Serve Candy In Hell?
